org.apache.edgent.graph.spi

Class AbstractGraph<G>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.edgent.graph.spi.AbstractGraph<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - unnecessary?
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectGraph

    public abstract class AbstractGraph<G>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph
    A skeletal implementation of the Graph interface, to minimize the effort required to implement the interface.

      void peekAll(Supplier<? extends Peek<?>> supplier, Predicate<Vertex<?,?,?>> select)
      Insert Peek oplets returned by the specified Supplier into the outputs of all of the oplets which satisfy the specified Predicate and where the output's Connector.isConnected() is true.

      • source

        public <N extends Source<P>,P> Connector<P> source(N oplet)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Create a new unconnected Vertex associated with the specified source Oplet.

        The Vertex for the oplet has 0 input connectors and one output connector.

        Specified by:
        source in interface Graph
        Type Parameters:
        N - a Source type
        P - tuple type
        Parameters:
        oplet - the source oplet
        Returns:
        the output connector for the newly created vertex.

      • pipe

        public <N extends Oplet<C,P>,C,P> Connector<P> pipe(Connector<C> output,
                                                    N oplet)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Create a new connected Vertex associated with the specified Oplet.

        The new Vertex has one input and one output Connector. An Edge is created connecting the specified output connector to the new vertice's input connector.

        Specified by:
        pipe in interface Graph
        Type Parameters:
        N - an Oplet type
        C - tuple type of input streams
        P - tuple type of output streams
        Parameters:
        output - the output connector to connect to the vertice's input connector
        oplet - the oplet to associate with the new Vertex
        Returns:
        the output connector for the new Vertex

      • peekAll

        public void peekAll(Supplier<? extends Peek<?>> supplier,
                    Predicate<Vertex<?,?,?>> select)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Insert Peek oplets returned by the specified Supplier into the outputs of all of the oplets which satisfy the specified Predicate and where the output's Connector.isConnected() is true.
        Specified by:
        peekAll in interface Graph
        Parameters:
        supplier - Function which provides a Peek oplet to insert
        select - Vertex selection Predicate
